scripts.compose: docker compose down && docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up -d
scripts.throughput:serial: SERIAL_PROJECTION=true docker compose run --rm k6 run --out influxdb=http://influxdb:8086/k6 /scripts/throughput.js
scripts.throughput:parallel: docker compose run --rm k6 run --out influxdb=http://influxdb:8086/k6 /scripts/throughput.js
